excerpt: The TMCM-3351 is a three axes motor controller/driver board for 2-phase bipolar stepper motors. It is the direct successor of the TMCM-351 - mechanically and electrically compatible - with our latest generation of stepper driver and motion controller ICs supporting linear and S-shaped ramps and closed-loop operation with external ABN-encoders.All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.More about the TMCL-IDESpecial Featuresclosed loop controlDcStep™ChopSync™
